table.name: vtiger_bhsvalidation
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsvalidation` ( `bhsvalidationid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsvalidation_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsvalidationid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsvalidationcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsvalidationcf` ( `bhsvalidationid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsvalidationid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
